1: I lift up my soul with trust and hope.
2: I trust in you and feel empowered.
3: I confidently trust in you and feel no shame.
4: I seek guidance to learn and follow your path.
5: Guide me in truth and I find my hope each day.
6: I embrace and cherish your endless kindness and mercy.
7: I focus on your kindness and embrace your goodness.
8: The Lord teaches me to follow the right path.
9: I am guided and taught with wisdom and compassion.

13: I live in peace and my legacy thrives.
14: I embrace wisdom and discover deep truths in my life.

16: I seek mercy and find strength in my vulnerability.
17: I seek support to overcome my difficulties.
18: I embrace my growth and seek forgiveness.

20: I trust in you and feel confident and secure.

22: I embrace freedom and strength from all challenges.
